name: Apuleius' dream
description:
Francesca Fini, 2016
Digital Photography, Performance Art, Costume Design, Blender, Photoshop

In his famous Metamorphoses, the Latin poet Apuleius tells the story of Lucio, who wanted to fly like a bird and clumsily resorts to magic. However, an incorrect spell turns him into a donkey, and in this guise, he goes through a thousand adventures. Only by eating the petals of a rose (philosophy) can he become human again. Through this photographic and performative project, I tell the eternal conflict between nature and culture, between our desire to rise and the inevitable falls, expressed in the pages of this visionary poet.
